name: UpdateHubdbRowDraft
description:
Update specific fields in a HubDB table's draft row.

This tool updates specific fields in a HubDB table's draft row. It should be called when you need to modify only certain columns of a row in the draft version of a HubDB table. You don't have to specify all fields, only those you intend to update.

parameters.name: table_identifier
parameters.description: The ID or name of the HubDB table to update the draft row in.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the table

parameters.name: row_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the row to be updated in the draft table.

parameters.name: draft_row_update_data
parameters.description: JSON object specifying key-value pairs for columns to update in the draft table row. Includes keys like `path`, `childTableId`, `values`, `name`, and `displayIndex`.

path.description: Specifies the value for `hs_path` column, which will be used as slug in the dynamic pages

childTableId.description: Specifies the value for the column child table id

values.description: List of key value pairs with the column name and column value

name.description: Specifies the value for `hs_name` column, which will be used as title in the dynamic pages

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: tableIdOrName
parameters.description: The ID or name of the table

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the table

path.description: Specifies the value for `hs_path` column, which will be used as slug in the dynamic pages

childTableId.description: Specifies the value for the column child table id

values.description: List of key value pairs with the column name and column value

name.description: Specifies the value for `hs_name` column, which will be used as title in the dynamic pages

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
